description: Ban the user from posting comments (Only for BL to try)

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID to recognize your registration is successful

parameters.name: account_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify user permission to the api, valid for 5min and encode to 4 level

parameters.name: ban_user_id
parameters.description: The user id that will be banned from posting comments

response_fields.name: status
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if not done. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Show error details if not done. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for call API request for error tracking
